TEST_ISNAN
  ISNAN(X) is TRUE if X is "Not a Number".

   Function  -1  0 +1 +2

  ACOS(X)     0  0  0  1
  ASIN(X)     0  0  0  1
  ATAN(X)     0  0  0  0
   LOG(X)     1  0  0  0
  SQRT(X)     1  0  0  0
    1 / X     0  0  0  0
